casebody.data:
Joel Paul Berger et al. v. 280 Railroad Avenue Associates Limited Partnership et al. (11305)

Dupont, C. J., La very and Freedman, Js.

Argued January 6 — decision released January 26, 1993 Paul L. Bollo, for the appellants (defendants). Louis Ciccarello, with whom, on the brief, was Benjamin Gershberg, for the appellees (plaintiffs). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
